div.p: This profile defines extensions defining additional constraints on data elements.
Data elements can be defined in several places. The extensions defined within this profile may apply to most or all of these:

ul.li: DataElement - defining the characteristics that must hold for an element to be an instance of a particular Data Element
Profile.structure.element.definition - defining the characteristics of the data element when used according to the profile
Profile.extensionDefn.definition - defining the characteristics of the extension, regardless of where it is used
Questionnaire.group.question - defining the characteristics of permitted answers

div.p: Note: Implementations are not required to reject invalid data. However, transmitting data that violates one of these extensions would be considered invalid against the resource that declared the extension.
The extensions provided here fall into several categories:

ul.li: Length-related (govern allowed length of an element): minLength, maxLength
Format (govern the appearance of string and string-like simple data types): regex, entryFormat
Numeric/date (govern the allowed range of numeric, date or time data types): minValue, maxValue, maxDecimalPlaces
